empty.title: Hmm, no names added yet!
empty.subtitle: Discover name days and add your favourites to see them here

info.title: About favourites
info.description: Here you can view all your favourite names, organized by months and days.
info.features:
For each name you can:
‚Ä¢ Add or remove from favourites
‚Ä¢ Turn notifications on or off for the name day
info.notifications: Notifications will be sent on the morning of the name day to remind you of the important day.

notifications.permissionMessage: To receive reminders about name days, please enable notifications in your device settings.
notifications.notificationsBlockedMessage: Notifications are currently disabled. Please enable them in your device settings to receive name day reminders.

search.title: Search Names
search.minCharacters: Enter at least 2 characters to search

toast.notificationsBlockedMessage: Notifications are currently disabled. Please enable them in your device settings to receive name day reminders.
